entries.label: Academic Transcript
entries.content: My grades, classes, and history. My first major was Education, and then I dabbled in Engineering and Physics for awhile before finally seeing the light and completing my degree in Computer Science. Regarding Fall of 2011, I had some medical issues late in the year that prevented me from completing three of my four classes. It was late in the semester so I was unable to obtain a medical drop, but I was at least able to finish my takehome work for the electromechanical systems class.
